question: Sodium bicarbonate (NaHCO_{3}) is commonly known as baking soda. Sodium bicarbonate is a white solid that can dissolve in water. Under the proper conditions, sodium bicarbonate can release carbon dioxide (CO_{2}) gas. Which of the following is not a physical property of sodium bicarbonate?
candidate_answers: (A) It is white. (B) It is a solid. (C) It can dissolve in water. (D) It releases carbon dioxide.
label: C
